Casino FAQ.text: Is Bob Casino Legal in Canada?

Bob Casino is legal in Canada. It is licensed under the Malta Gaming Authorities. Malta is one of the most stringent regulatory bodies in Canada that also operates several other casinos in the country. All these ensure that Bob Casino meets the high standards and safety requirements that are essential for a casino. Therefore, Bob Casino is authorized to offer gambling experiences to players in Canada.
Can you win real money at Bob Casino?

Yes, you can win real money by playing casino games at Bob Casino in Canada. All the games follow the Random Number Generator system. It means that every outcome of the game is random and is not manipulated. So, all the rewards or real money that you win at Bob Casino are won legally.

No, Bob Casino does not have a mobile app at the moment. But, the developers might launch the apps soon for the players. However, every game featured in Bob Casino is made in HTML5 format. So they are mobile friendly. You can play them using the mobile version of the casino in Canada.

The average withdrawal time at Bob Casino is 24 Hours. While the majority of the withdrawals are processed within 24 hours, some of them also take more than a day to process the withdrawals.
